thread.title: Build-A-Bear: Furry Friends Only $8 Each (Regularly Up To $25.50)
thread.title_full: Build-A-Bear: Furry Friends Only $8 Each (Regularly Up To $25.50)

author: Hannah (Sensational Sidekick)
title: Build-A-Bear: Furry Friends Only $8 Each (Regularly Up To $25.50)
text:
Today and online only or while supplies last, Build-A-Bear is offering up select Furry Friends for only $8 (regularly up to $25.50) when you vote in the 3rd Annual Bearacket Challenge. Just head here and click on your favorite characters four times to be redirected to the Furry Friends sale.

And through April 16th, you can snag a $10 Gift Card for only $5 with a purchase of $25 or more – available in-stores or online . Keep in mind that your gift card will be valid on a future purchase. You can even send the $10 e-gift card to yourself or someone else and receive it when your order ships!
You can also score $5 off select purchases of $20 or more with promo code 2002776 at checkout, valid through April 15th only. However, this code does not appear to be working with the $8 Furry Friends .
Keep in mind that shipping is free with a $40 purchase OR if you have a ShopRunner account, you can score free 2-day shipping with a $25 order.
(Thanks Megan!),
